summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3520 for the improvement of North 56th Street, from the east margin of 1st Avenue Northeast to the west margin of Keystone Place; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43599, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
